title: (x) "Stubb's Bar-B-Q" faceted slab serif by Decoder - Ironmonger {Yves}
content:
Hi all.

I followed the post on Otis Saves which brought me to the designers, Decoder. Great work. So can anyone ID this one? It looks like something from the Emigre stable. Design by Decoder.

Thanks
